mdRecord.dcterms:title: Carrel 4-5, north wall

mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Expressions of love and hate for UVA. Expression of love with initials. Ominous phrase. Game of Thrones hashtag. Doodle of eyes, possibly corresponding to the label "ecstasy" near it. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
2/22/16 | I ♥ UVA me too! | I hate UVA | Through all of space and time A + G ♥ 12/5/18 | The replicans are upon us | #FORTHETHRONE | Ecstasy
